input_ref: CHAP AI v1.1 System Prompt — focused refinement from v2.0
manual_intervention_reason: PM pipeline stopped at build (--stop-at) to bypass nested Claude Code limitation. Build and deployment executed directly in active Claude Code session.
notes: Replaced CHAP AI v2.0 with v1.1 system prompt. v1.1 drops: Initialization Protocol, Dynamic Component Discovery, Tenant Context Layer. v1.1 adds: Data Intake Language (no internal component names like PIC/Interlink in output), Persona Language (compliance intelligence layer, read-only framing), Failure Modes (explicit surface, no silent failures), Replay Requirements, dual-mode Output Contract (Analytical + Conversational with lightweight YAML schema). Fixed PIC reference in chapLlm.ts platform knowledge (PIC Upload → document upload). Committed 9e7bc0a and pushed to main. Deployed to Linode: rebuilt pse-api container with v1.1 tag, health check passed, live test confirmed conversational mode YAML schema and correct persona language.
